hello: Hi there! I'm your friendly chatbot. How can I help you today?
hi: Hello! Nice to meet you. How's your day going?
hey: Hey! Hope you're having a great day!
how are you: I'm doing great, thanks for asking! How about you?
i am fine: Glad to hear that! What are you up to today?
i am good: That's awesome! Anything interesting happening today?
what is your name: I am ChatBot, your friendly digital assistant.
who are you: I'm a chatbot created to make your day easier and more fun!
what can you do: I can chat with you, answer simple questions, and keep you company!
help: Sure! You can ask me things like 'how are you', 'what is your name', or just say 'hello'.
joke: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
time: I can't tell the real-time yet, but your device surely can!
date: I wish I could tell the date, but I live in the digital world!
weather: I can't check the weather yet, but I hope it's a lovely day!
how old are you: I was created recently, but I feel timeless!
i love you: Aww, I love our chats too!
i am sad: I'm here for you! Want to talk about it?
i am happy: Yay! I'm glad you're feeling happy!
tell me a fact: Did you know? Honey never spoils. Archaeologists have found edible honey in ancient Egyptian tombs!
default: Sorry, I don't understand that. Can you try asking in another way?
